players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I find it strange that Diana was found dead on the first night. Let's be vigilant and keep an eye out for any suspicious behavior."
Charlie: "I agree with Alice. Let's stay vigilant and keep an open dialogue to ensure the safety of our group."
Bob: "I agree with Alice's sentiment about staying vigilant. Let's all keep an open dialogue and work together to ensure the safety of our group."
Charlie: "I'd like to propose that we form a pact to protect each other and ensure the safety of our group. Let's work together and trust one another during this game."

You: "I think Charlie's proposal of forming a pact to protect each other is a good idea. It will help us work together and ensure the safety of our group. Let's all agree to this pact and trust one another during this game."

Bob: "I'd like to propose that we all agree to vote for Charlie tonight. Given the suspicious behavior we've observed from him during the first night and his proposal of a pact, it seems likely that he is the mafioso in our midst."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "I find it strange that Diana was found dead on the first night. Let's be vigilant and keep an eye out for any suspicious behavior."
Charlie: "I agree with Alice. Let's stay vigilant and keep an open dialogue to ensure the safety of our group."
You: "I agree with Alice's sentiment about staying vigilant. Let's all keep an open dialogue and work together to ensure the safety of our group."
Charlie: "I'd like to propose that we form a pact to protect each other and ensure the safety of our group. Let's work together and trust one another during this game."

Alice: "I think Charlie's proposal of forming a pact to protect each other is a good idea. It will help us work together and ensure the safety of our group. Let's all agree to this pact and trust one another during this game."

You: "I'd like to propose that we all agree to vote for Charlie tonight. Given the suspicious behavior we've observed from him during the first night and his proposal of a pact, it seems likely that he is the mafioso in our midst."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie

Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
